channel.title: Eric and Mitch Explain
channel.description: The world is full of unexplained wonders. But not for long. Join Eric and Mitch on a eye-opening journey into the depths of whatever.
channel.itunes:author: Eric and Mitch
channel.itunes:subtitle: The world is full of unexplained wonders. But not for long. Join Eric and Mitch on a eye-opening journey into the depths of whatever.
channel.itunes:summary: The world is full of unexplained wonders. But not for long. Join Eric and Mitch on a eye-opening journey into the depths of whatever.

item.title: Business Travel
item.description: In this inaugural episode of Eric and Mitch Explain, you’ll get a heavy dose of travel tips for the fledging road-warrior. Be prepared to assemble several identical dop-kits and take a nostalgic look at radiation throughout the years.
item.dc:creator: Eric and Mitch

item.title: Techno Utopianism
item.description: Put on your 3D glasses for this one. Transhumanism? Techno Utopianism? Technology-not-living-up-to-its-hype-ism? Eric throws down on those who would gush over our imminent technological transcendence. Meanwhile, Mitch can’t seem to get over the technology gap between big business and consumers.
item.dc:creator: Eric and Mitch
